ygData.subject: Re: Locations of metal and molds
ygData.msgSnippet: Large molds also in either Grobb or Oggok, not sure where, but one of them has them. Or maybe I think it might be in Feerrott, on an Ogre Vendor. The one thing
ygData.messageBody:
Large molds also in either Grobb or Oggok, not sure where, but one of them
has them. Or maybe I think it might be in Feerrott, on an Ogre Vendor.

The one thing I would like to know, anyone know anything about plate and
weapons? I think it might be getting close, because Fletching and Jewelcraft
have been revamped, maybe if only a little, they have been modified. I feel
smithing is next in line. At least I hope so. If anyone has any knowledge of
this, please tell me. Also, anyone know if Enchanters are going to be able to
enchant metal to make some fine magic plate?
